hangle: 독자님들의 사랑과 관심으로 <내 남자 주인공의 아내가 되었다> 시즌 2가 무사히 마무리되었습니다. 작가님들의 휴식과 재정비 기간을 가지고 더 아름답고 재밌는 시즌 3으로 찾아뵙겠습니다. 앞으로도 많은 기대와 사랑 부탁드립니다. 감사합니다.
first_translate: Season 2 of “I Became the Wife of the Male Lead” has come to an end thanks to the love and support of our readers. The creators will take a break to rest and prepare for a more beautiful and fun season 3. Please continue to show us your love and support. Thank you.
idiom_translate: Season 2 of “I Became the Wife of the Male Lead” has come to an end thanks to the love and support of our readers. We’ll be back with a more beautiful and exciting Season 3 after the author takes a break and gets ready. Please continue to support us. Thank you.
label: After our readers have shown our webtoon so much love and interest,  Season 2 of "Author of My Own Destiny"  has come to an end.  After a period of rest and relaxation for our creators, we will be back with an even more beautiful  and exciting third season.  Please continue to show us your love and support. Thank you.
idiom:
내심 정해왔던 끝이 마침내 왔을 뿐 : The ending I had secretly expected has finally come.
마음속에서 차오르는 기쁨에 질식할 것 같다 : I feel like I'm suffocating from the overwhelming joy rising inside me.
